title: EthereumReboot
author: EthereumReboot
created_time: October 15, 2022, 08:28:52 PMLast edit: October 16, 2022, 02:31:37 PM by EthereumReboot
content: Ethereum Reboot - Back to OriginEthereum Reboot (ETHR) is the original version of Ethereum Protocol powered by Proof of Work (PoW) consensus. We, the Ethereum Reboot team aim to keep the core vision of pre-merge Ethereum alive by rebooting Ethereum with the original Proof of Work with Ethash algorithm.Expected Launch Date: 01-Nov-2022Official Links:üî∑ Website: ethereumreboot.org (under development)üî∑ Telegram Channel: https://t.me/EthereumRebootüî∑ Telegram Group: https://t.me/Ethereum_Rebootüî∑ Twitter: https://twitter.com/EthereumRebootüî∑ Discord: https://discord.gg/XwdM4DY5dHüî∑ Bitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417253.new#new

comments.author: LeadPoisoning
comments.body: So, I have to ask... How will ETHR be different from ETHW?

comments.author: EthereumReboot
comments.body: Quote from: LeadPoisoning on October 15, 2022, 10:49:21 PMSo, I have to ask... How will ETHR be different from ETHW?ETHW is a hardfork of Ethereum, meaning it contains the same chain / database of Ethereum since 2015. But ETHR is a new chain built from 0 (genesis) block.

comments.author: coin790
comments.body: Thanks for confirming what I feared. It is not possible to mine on 4GB cards.Same thing happened to me on ETHW, the dag started with more than 5GB, many 4GB cards ran out of chance

comments.body: Interesting to see how this project will go. Good luck.
